job_history.work_description: Represent Information Technology as a member of the senior leadership team with oversight of all tactical and strategic aspects of corporate IT systems. Manage and lead six-person team that oversees all IT Infrastructure and Business Intelligence operations at one of the largest United Ways in the nation ($38M Revenue).

Directly responsible for mission critical support of all computer, network, and telecom infrastructure including 800 Windows XP/Windows 7 workstations and 160 Windows 2003/2008 servers at 28 treatment centers, five operations offices, and two co-location facilities.

Managed eleven person team of Help Desk Technicians, System Administrators, System Engineers, and System Architects. Responsible for all new hire and terminate activities, staff scheduling, mentoring, and reviews.

Managed eight person team of Help Desk Engineers, Network Administrators, Network Engineers, and Telecommunications Administrators. Directly responsible for mission critical support of WAN, LAN, 300+ Windows 2000/XP workstations, and 85 Windows 2000/2003 servers.
Solely responsible for mission critical support of 400+ Windows 95/98 workstations and 30 Windows NT 4.0 servers for multi-million dollar mortgage broker with offices in 3 states.
Inside Sales Representative for Company Name.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including Vice President, Director, and Manager positions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: IT Infrastructure Management
skills.explanation: Has managed large-scale IT infrastructure, including networks, servers, and workstations, across multiple organizations, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has managed teams of varying sizes, including teams of up to eleven people, indicating expert-level mastery of team management skills.

skills.name: Network Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience with network administration, including WAN and LAN support, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: System Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience with system administration, including Windows and server management, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has managed multiple IT projects, including mission-critical support, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Business Administration
skills.explanation: Has a Master's degree in Business Administration and has applied business administration skills in various roles, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience with communication, including sales and leadership roles, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Windows
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with Microsoft Windows, including Windows XP, Windows 7, and Windows Server, showing strong proficiency.
